name: Box Wizard
description:
You're a wizard with apetite! Unfortunately, you just moved into recently sieged castle and you are still settling in. You forgot your book with recipes in your room! Luckily, you can manipulate time and spaced and push boxes! Jump between medieval time and futuristic time to overcome obstacles, push boxes to help you get about. Finally get that book so you can finally eat!

Made under 72 hours for Game Jam Lame Jam 27

PS: My first Unity game, first game jam, sorry for the mess.

Credits:
Battle Wizard Poly art by Dungeon Mason (Although it was problematic to obtain it)
CastlePack_3D Enviroment by Kinitia Studios
Low Poly Dungeons Lite by JustCreate
Sci-Fi Construction Kit (Modular) by Sickhead Games
Ultimate Low Poly Dungeon by Broken Vector
